https://tmrev.io/movie/559763-Dark Suns 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fGfgCbvW1VbQIyxWEVQlrOVFuZf.jpg An epic investigation into countless murders in Mexico. Presented in chapters, the film unfolds methodically through unsettling testimonials, sketching a portrait of an entire country transformed into a gigantic mass grave thanks to a climate of impunity established by both criminal gangs and state authorities. Dark Suns
